summary: This mod adds one new set based on the Greybeard Outfit, the wizard\'s outfit, it also adds one staff, the wizard\'s staff.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new set of robes in the world of Skyrim.

I always wanted to have the greybeards robes playable. So I made them playable.
Every retexture of the greybeards robes works alright with this mod.

The set is called the wizards set, and is craftable at the skyforge under the glass section.

This is my first mod, soon I will upload another mod.
author: StevenBorn
